alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:58PM EDT until July 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHEASTERN LACKAWANNA AND WEST CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTIES... At 458 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waymart, or near Carbondale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Archbald, Blakely, Dickson City, Olyphant, Clarks Summit, Jessup, Jermyn, Forest City and Mayfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
